## Experiment: Titer Spike point mutant pseudovirus

**2022-01-17 (ACE2hi)**
**2022-01-24 (ACE2lo)**
**2022-01-17 (p24 ELISA)**

### Define colorblind-friendly palette
```{r}
# The palette with grey:
cbPalette <- c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9", "#009E73", "#F0E442", 
               "#0072B2", "#D55E00", "#CC79A7")
# The palette with black
cbbPalette <- c("#000000", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9", "#009E73", "#F0E442", 
                "#0072B2", "#D55E00", "#CC79A7")
```

### Read in data from titering (luciferase) and p24 quantifications
```{r read_input}
dt <- read.csv(file="./titer_data/all_data.csv", stringsAsFactors=F)
head(dt)
```

### Plot relative titers as measured by luciferase activity for WH1 cycle, HEK-ACE2 cell line
```{r}
dt_WH1 <- dt[dt$background=="WH1_D614G",] %>% mutate(genotype = factor(genotype, 
                                levels=c("none", "wt", 
                                         "Y449H", "N501Y", "Y449H/N501Y")))

ggplot(dt_WH1,
       aes(genotype, RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi/exp(mean(log(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"]))))
       ) +
  geom_point(size=3.5,
             shape=16,
             position=position_jitter(width = 0.1, height = 0, seed = 0)) +
  #geom_hline(yintercept=25/exp(mean(log(dt[dt$genotype=="wildtype" & dt$uL_virus=="50","virus_per_mL_stringent"]))), color="grey", linetype="dashed") + #Limit of detection
  scale_y_log10(lim=c(1e-6, 1e1)) +
  xlab("Spike gene") +
  ylab("relative titer") +
  theme_bw()  +
  ggtitle("D614G background, ACE2-high cell line") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))

ggsave(
  "./results/titers_D614G-cycle_ACE2hi.pdf",
  scale = 1,
  width = 6,
  height = 4,
  useDingbats=F
)
```

### quants and t-tests for titer differences in omicron cycle
```{r}
#geomean function
geomean <- function(x){
  return(exp(mean(log(x))))
}

#calc fold-change in geomean titer compared to wt, absolute titer, ACE2hi
#omicron R498Q vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="R498Q","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])
#omicron Y501N vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="Y501N","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])
#omicron R498Q/Y501N vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="R498Q/Y501N","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])

#calc fold-change in geomean titer compared to wt, absolute titer, ACE2lo
#omicron R498Q vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="R498Q","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])
#omicron Y501N vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="Y501N","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])
#omicron R498Q/Y501N vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="R498Q/Y501N","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])

#calc fold-change in geomean titer compared to wt, RLU/pg p24 titer, ACE2hi
#omicron R498Q vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="R498Q","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])
#omicron Y501N vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="Y501N","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])
#omicron R498Q/Y501N vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="R498Q/Y501N","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])

#calc fold-change in geomean titer compared to wt, RLU/pg p24 titer, ACE2lo
#omicron R498Q vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="R498Q","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])
#omicron Y501N vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="Y501N","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])
#omicron R498Q/Y501N vs wt
geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="R498Q/Y501N","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])

#calc fold-change in geomean titer compared to wt, absolute titer, ACE2hi
#WH1 Y449H vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="Y449H","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])
#WH1 N501Y vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="N501Y","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])
#WH1 Y449H/N501Y vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="Y449H/N501Y","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2hi"])

#calc fold-change in geomean titer compared to wt, absolute titer, ACE2lo
#WH1 Y449H vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="Y449H","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])
#WH1 N501Y vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="N501Y","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])
#WH1 Y449H/N501Y vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="Y449H/N501Y","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_uL_ACE2lo"])

#calc fold-change in geomean titer compared to wt, RLU/pg p24 titer, ACE2hi
#WH1 Y449H vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="Y449H","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])
#WH1 N501Y vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="N501Y","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])
#WH1 Y449H/N501Y vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="Y449H/N501Y","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"])

#calc fold-change in geomean titer compared to wt, RLU/pg p24 titer, ACE2lo
#WH1 Y449H vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="Y449H","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])
#WH1 N501Y vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="N501Y","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])
#WH1 Y449H/N501Y vs wt
geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="Y449H/N501Y","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])/geomean(dt_WH1[dt_WH1$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2lo"])



t.test(log10(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"]),log10(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="R498Q","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"]))
t.test(log10(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"]),log10(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="Y501N","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"]))
t.test(log10(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="wt","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"]),log10(dt_omicron[dt_omicron$genotype=="R498Q/Y501N","RLU_per_pg_p24_ACE2hi"]))
```
